website_summaries.verdict: The Vans Canvas Old Skool carries much of the DNA of that legendary skate footwear—the Old Skool. The newer silhouette features a more modern appeal and fresher look. The sneaker’s allure is boosted further by the great selection of colorways available, the top-notch quality, perfect fit and sizing, and comfortable feel.The shoe comes with a few weaknesses, however. The low-top footwear’s white colorway tends to turn yellow permanently after a wash. The breaking-in period can also be quite uncomfortable for the first few days of wear.
pros: The number one thing most reviewers agreed on when it came to the Vans Canvas Old Skool is how comfortable it is
The shoe has a fresh and clean look that many purchasers loved
They also liked how easily you can pair the low-top sneaker with most outfits
Plenty of purchasers reported receiving compliments on their choice of kick
A good number of buyers were happy about the wide selection of colorways for this Vans model
According to several testers, the Vans Canvas Old Skool is extremely versatile with a flat sole that gives great board feel and better flick
For those who don’t skate and want a comfier feel, the shoe can easily accommodate inserts
The quality of the low-top Vans sneaker is top-notch, some users said
The Vans Canvas Old Skool provides a good fit, a few people reported
The casual sneaker runs true-to-size according to a handful of persons
A couple of individuals commended the low-top lifestyle shoe for its durability
cons: Several reviewers complained that the white colorway of the sneaker tends to turn yellow after you wash it or if it gets wet then dries
A few people reported that the Vans Canvas Old Skool sneaker needs breaking in
Some buyers were disappointed with the white colorway of the low-top casual sneaker
They stated that it was more off-white or cream than true white
Two people were not pleased that the shoe creased at the top on the first day of wear

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's school shoes, size 7. They have a light coloured line down down the rim either side under the laces which she didn't like so we had to colour in with a fabric market to hide it. The kids sizes don't seem to have this. Unfortunately the rubber trim split after three weeks of wear so they were returned. No problem returning to Amazon. We have bought another pair to try.
customer_reviews.author: E M

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, poorly fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong these shoes look great. Having tried the 11s which were huge and the 10s which were too tight I have some 10.5’s that just don’t fit as well as I would like. For those of us that remember these as comfy skate shoes from back in the day be warned the sole is tough and has a weird feel. I walk around 7 miles a day and am mostly on my feet at work, these are not doing it for me. I had a pair of these as a kid and they were the best shoes I had! Vans has definitely sacrificed quality over churning these out. However they do look good..
customer_reviews.author: Demasaur

customer_reviews.title: I was instantly in love with these and have literally worn them for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was instantly in love with these and have literally worn them for a day, maybe 6hours actually and I just went to undo them and the shoe late has literally snapped shortening it a fair bit. Has really upset me as I only recently have done them fully up in the style I’ve liked. Oh dear. Going to have to buy more laces which is unfortunate. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jay cook

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a alternative to my regular van shoes and all.i can say is that I'm not a fan, I gave them 4 stars because after the initial adjustment period they where adequate shoes for about a year but as soon as I could justify buying better shoes I did.
customer_reviews.author: S_666

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I love vans trainers but these... are horrible. They are not finished like my gfs with the black trimmed edges. They are very flimsy and weak looking. I wore them once and ditched them. I think they sent me fake ones tbh!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Van Old Skool Black Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, however I am now unable to wear these shoes as I have started getting blisters every time I wear them. they are still in good condition and look good, despite this I find them very uncomfortable and now am unable to fit them. They are still good shoes and are a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake L.

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 8 months ago. I wear them to work (I do an office job) and walk for about 1 hour in them every day. A hole has appear in the inside of the right heel. And where they flex around the balls of my feet, there are wear and tear holes. I do not run in them. I do not kick or rub them against anything. I just walk in them. And then I sit in them. Very disappointed. My previous pair of Vans lasted 3 years before the sole fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent genuine product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Genuine Vans trainers for a cheaper price than from a High Street store. Fits true to size, very comfortable and looks great 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: vans make great trainers but the unisex are made for the slimmer foot therefore a bit tight for men
customer_reviews.author: paul white

customer_reviews.title: Stealthy waffles
customer_reviews.text: I have over a dozen pairs of old skools and these are a welcome addition to that collection. High quality as always from vans, grippy waffle soles and reinforced metal lace eyelets. A+++
customer_reviews.author: EmzTF81

customer_reviews.title: Tight across the foot.
customer_reviews.text: Not able to really review them as I had to send them back due to being too tight a fit across the foot though the length was perfect. Seems to be down to the unisex nature of the shoe. Quality looked good and the service from Amazon was excellent as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Classic
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but your only going to get 5 Star reviews for this product. Have bought this style of Van over and over (nothing stays white forever) and will continue to do so as it’s an absolute classic that goes with so many outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Nalten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect black Olk Skool skate shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, Vans Old Skool shoes as described. My daughter needed these for school and they were cheaper online than in the shop - which I was delighted with. They were delivered in good time and well packaged. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eilish (Ireland)

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes, fit as expected, no surprises. Only downside, if you stand a lot you may get some knee pain since the insole is very thin, but I solved the problem with some gel heel plantar and I had no problems since them.
customer_reviews.author: mirko

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, classic look.
customer_reviews.text: Other than picking up the dirt a bit more than I'd hope they are good looking and comfortable. With the retro/classic styling I can wear them during the day and just throw on some pearls and they're ready for evening wear... ;)

customer_reviews.title: lovely pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the colour it goes with everything and looks stunning , I also tried the black and white pair which I disliked. I just wish it will hold down well when it rains here in London.

customer_reviews.title: As you expect from Vans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as new work shoes. My job involves alot of walking so i go through trainers pretty rapidly (3/4 pairs last year), so im always on the look out for cheaper places to buy the same kind of trainers i love. Vans are my go-to brand, and these are perfect for my needs. They took a bit of "wearing in" but that was just having to loosen the laces slightly.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, excellent vans
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected - good quality authentic vans at a great price and very comfortable. One thing to note that isn't totally clear from the picture - the lining of the lace insert flaps is white, not black like the rest of the shoe weirdly.

They are thick woven fabric so not sure how they will fair in wet/bad weather. OK when dry. Thin tread on sole so not for heavy duty rambling. Fine for walk around town.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy shoes good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy shoes that are deeper and wider than the standard Vans style shoes so are perfect for my daughter who has wide feet and also has to wear orthotic insoles. You do need to go up a size in length however as they seen to come up a little smaller than expected.
